CAME.pipeline module¶

Created on Tue Apr 20 20:11:08 2021

@author: Xingyan Liu

CAME.pipeline.gather_came_results(dpair, trainer: CAME.utils.train.Trainer, classes: Sequence, keys: Sequence, keys_compare=None, resdir: Union[str, pathlib.Path] = '.', checkpoint: Union[int, str] = 'best', batch_size: Optional[int] = None)¶

Packed function for pipeline as follows: 1. load the ‘best’ model weights 2. get the predictions for cells, including probabilities (from logits) 3. get and the hidden states for both cells and genes 3. make a predictor

CAME.pipeline.main_for_aligned(adatas: anndata._core.anndata.AnnData, vars_feat: Sequence, vars_as_nodes: Optional[Sequence] = None, scnets: Optional[Sequence[scipy.sparse.base.spmatrix]] = None, dataset_names: Sequence[str] = ('reference', 'query'), key_class1: str = 'cell_ontology_class', key_class2: Optional[str] = None, do_normalize: bool = False, n_epochs: int = 350, resdir: Optional[Union[pathlib.Path, str]] = None, tag_data: Optional[str] = None, params_model: dict = {}, params_lossfunc: dict = {}, check_umap: bool = False, n_pass: int = 100, batch_size: Optional[int] = None, plot_results: bool = True, norm_target_sum=10000.0)¶
CAME.pipeline.main_for_unaligned(adatas: anndata._core.anndata.AnnData, vars_use: Sequence[Sequence], vars_as_nodes: Sequence[Sequence], df_varmap: pandas.core.frame.DataFrame, df_varmap_1v1: Optional[pandas.core.frame.DataFrame] = None, scnets: Optional[Sequence[scipy.sparse.base.spmatrix]] = None, dataset_names: Sequence[str] = ('reference', 'query'), key_class1: str = 'cell_ontology_class', key_class2: Optional[str] = None, do_normalize: bool = False, n_epochs: int = 350, resdir: Optional[Union[pathlib.Path, str]] = None, tag_data: Optional[str] = None, params_model: dict = {}, params_lossfunc: dict = {}, check_umap: bool = False, n_pass: int = 100, plot_results: bool = True, batch_size: Optional[int] = None)¶
CAME.pipeline.preprocess_aligned(adatas, key_class: str, df_varmap_1v1: Optional[pandas.core.frame.DataFrame] = None, use_scnets: bool = True, n_pcs: int = 30, nneigh_scnet: int = 5, nneigh_clust: int = 20, ntop_deg: int = 50)¶

Steps: * align variables * preprocessing * candidate genes (HVGs and DEGs) * pre-clustering query data * single-cell network

CAME.pipeline.preprocess_unaligned(adatas, key_class: str, use_scnets: bool = True, n_pcs: int = 30, nneigh_scnet: int = 5, nneigh_clust: int = 20, ntop_deg: int = 50)¶

Steps: * preprocessing * candidate genes (HVGs and DEGs) * pre-clustering query data * single-cell network
